Description: Fragment of flaring ring foot and wall of East Greek pottery cup; pale orange clay with silver mica; interior glazed orange; cream wash on the outside and underside; 'E' cut on underside.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), temenos (said to be)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.228)
